entry.title: World's Finest
entry.summary:
Author: Salamence_373

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,257Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 40

Summary: Clark is new to Metropolis after landing his dream job as a journalist at the Daily Planet that's in a frenzy covering the new hero Superman that's moved to town. Bruce has been fighting as Batman for three years but still has a long way to go juggling his double life. These two have been searching for meaning as they strive towards their ultimate goals on an inevitable collision course. Their rivalry sparks new passion from both of them as they find out they aren't so different after all, while finding what's been missing from their lives. They each bring out the best in each other and make them better heroes and people as they build for a better tomorrow.

entry.title: The Wrong Cape in the Right City
entry.summary:
Author: brmqtr

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,020Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 15

Summary: When Clark Kent wakes up in Gotham’s safehouse wearing the Batsuit, things can only go downhill — or hilariously sideways. What starts as a simple wardrobe mix-up turns into a week of intercity chaos: a smiling “Batman” sighted flying over Metropolis, a Kryptonian impostor demanding tribute, and Alfred developing new levels of patience (and sarcasm). Between group chat scandals, drone-powered rescue missions, and one very stubborn argument about emotional decontamination, Superman and Batman find themselves balancing world-saving with something far riskier — learning how to stay. A romantic comedy about light meeting shadow, coffee meeting brood, and what happens when the world’s greatest heroes finally admit that home might just be each other.
